mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(User_id, Password, Nickname, Intro, Review, Provider,Profileimg,Birthday,Gender, Type, Address, AddressDetail, Interests ) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{intro}, #{review}, #{provider}, #{profileImg}, #{birthDay}, #{gender}, #{type}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{interests})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users WHERE User_id = #{userId} AND Password = #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE User_id = #{userId}
